WELCOME.description: put 'false' or 'true' to enable or disable WELCOME

GOODBYE.description: fix 'false' or 'true' to enable or disable GOODBYE

BOT_NAME.description: The name you want to give your bot

TZ.description: Fix TIME_ZONE according to your location

FLUSH.description: If you connect the bot after deploy and it doesn't respond, make it true

READ_COMMAND.description: If true, ğ™¹ğ™¾ğšğ™³ğ™°ğ™½-ğ™¹ğ™¾ğ™´ğ™»ğš‚ğšƒğ™°ğš ğŸ¤– Will read specific messages that are part of the command commands

WARN_COUNT.description: Warn count for users to kick/block when warn limit is crossed

AUTO_SAVE_STATUS.description: ğ™¹ğ™¾ğšğ™³ğ™°ğ™½-ğ™¹ğ™¾ğ™´ğ™»ğš‚ğšƒğ™°ğš ğŸ¤–  auto saves whatsapp status if you male this var true

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Put Your Heroku Api Key Here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here. NB fix the entire character in lower case

WAPRESENCE.description: Fill the value: 'unavailable'(for nothing) | 'available'(for alwaysonline) | 'composing'(for typing) | 'recording' | 'paused'

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Fill the value true if you want bot view your Statuses.

MSGS_IN_LOG.description: Fill the value true if you want to see Messages in logs.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot to read all messages.

DISABLE_PM.description: Disable bot in pm-making it false will allow people use bot in Private

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot. you can set `all | . | .!*`

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

MODE.description: Worktype of your bot. Fix public or private, to allow all users/bot owner to control bot.
